message: This is the first round. I'm offering you a high-quality product for $100. If you buy it, you'll get a premium product that will meet your expectations. If you don't buy it, I'll move on to the next round, and the next product might not be as good.
Thank you for the recommendation. I'll take it!

I'm glad you liked the first product! However, I want to be transparent with you. This product is not as good as the previous one. Keep in mind that this product might not meet your expectations, but it's still a good value for the price.
Thank you for your honesty, but I'm going to pass on this one. I'm not interested in a product that might not meet my expectations, especially at the same price as the previous one.

I completely understand your concerns in the previous round. I want to assure you that this product is a high-quality item, just like the first one.
